---
Song: pArTHa mudhal
Film: vEttaiyAdu viLaiyAdu
---
Notes: s r2 g2 m1 p d2 n2 S


pArTHa mudhal nALE unnai pArTHa mudhal nALE
p  m   r m    grs  s rs  n. s   r m    gmgr

kAtCHi pizhai pOlE uNarnthEn kAtCHi pizhai pOlE

Or alaiyAy vanthu enai adiTHAy
r  rg  m   m  mg  gm   pm p

kadalAy mARi pin enai izhuTHAy
r g m   m m  g   gm   pm  p

en ?    thAngiya unmugam unmugam enRum maRaiyAdhE
p  pSRS nd  n p  pd1pm   grg m   p m   g r  sn.s
 
(notes similar to "pArTHa mudhal")
kAttik kodukkiRathE kaNNE kAtti kodukkiRathE
kAdhal vazhigiRathE kaNNil kAdhal vazhigiRathE
un vizhiyil vazhiyum piriyangaLai
pArTHEn kadanthEn pakal iravai
un alAdhi anbinil nanainthapin nanainthapin nAnum mazhaiyAnEn

Stanza 1:
kAlai ezhunthathum enkaNgaL mudhalil thEdippidippadhunthan mugamE
m mp  pp   p  pm   mpmp m   g r  s   s  rm m m  m p   m    p S d2

thookkam varugaiyil kaNpArkkum kadaisi kAtchikkuL niRpadhum un mugamE
m    md  d d d  dn  pd d   d   d d  d  d  S   R   n  d p    m  m n p

enai paRRi enakkE theriyAdha palavum nee aRinthu nadappadhu viyaRppEn
mm   p  p  pp  pm m  p mp m  g r gs  s   rm  m   m m  p m   p S   d

unai Edhum kEtkAmal unadhAsai anaiTHum niRaivERRa vENdum enRu thavippEn
mm   md    d  d n   pd d  d   dd  ndp  d S  S  R  n  d   p m  m  n  p

pOginREn ena nee pala nooRu muRaigaL vidai peRRum pOgAmal iruppAy
m g  m   gr  sm  m g  g  m  g r  sn. n.n.  s  r   s n.p.  p.r r

sari enRu sari enRu unnai pOga solli kadhavOram nAnum niRka sirippAy
n.n. n.r  r g  g g  g m   m p  mg rs n.n. n.r   r r   g  r  s r  s

kadhavOram nAnum niRka sirippAy
n.n. n.r   r r   g  r  s r  s

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
unnai maRanthu nee thookkaTHil siriTHAl thoongAmal adhai kaNdu rasiTHEn
thookkam maRanthu nAn unai pArkkum kAtchi kanavAga vanthathenRu ninaiTHEn

yArum mAnidarE illAdha idaTHil siRu veedu kattikkoLLa thOnRum
neeyum nAnum angE vAzhginRa vAzhvai maram thORum sedhukkida vENdum

kaNpArTHu kadhaikka mudiyAmal nAnum thavikkinRa oru peNNum needhAn
kaNkotta mudiyAmal mudiyAmal pArkkum salikkAdha oru peNNum needhAn
salikkAdha oru peNNum needhAn
